Text: First of all, there doesn't appear to be any .exe file, just two compressed .dmgs. I tried merging them with 'chunk joiner', but that program apparently only works in classic mode, so no use for me on my macbook pro w/ osx lion. Just for the sake of it, I tried decompressing the 7.15gb .dmg, which resulted in a non-functioning app icon. Not exactly a resounding success.
